channel.title: zzz on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in zzz on Barefoot Rob

item.title: woke up in Noborito
item.description: 07:05 Wednesday 04 April 2018 JST This morning I woke up with a start in Noborito, where I transfer between lines from Odakyu main line to JR Nambu line. “Oh snap my stop!” and bounced out of my seat, got off the train and was confused about how far down the platform I was. “Where am I? This is… ohhhh…” and went back in the train and sat back down in my seat.

item.title: Planet on Purpose
item.description: 22:15 Monday 02 April 2018 JST No one attended co-gender group (besides me) today. I read several pages of Planet on Purpose by Brandon Peele. Quite a good book for me.

item.title: Sleepy
item.description: 2:36am CST Sunday 12 March 2000 Ack! It’s late! “Today” 9am at Maggie and John’s new house to help them move. Munched breakfast of fruit and donuts before we headed out for the storage unit. (During the time they’ve been “between houses”, living with Molly and Will, most of their junk has been in a storage shed thing.) Three loads and 4.5 hours later, and the stuff was all at the house.
